< 1.0.2.Textual: NOTE: OpenSSL version < 1.0.2 can only use one curve at a time. If you want to use multiple curves, you must upgrade OpenSSL to version 1.0.2 or higher.

1024-long DH.Apache:
Run the following command to generate 1024bit DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 >> /path/to/cert.
To remove 1024bit DH keys run the following command: sed -i '/BEGIN DH PARAMETERS/,/END DH PARAMETERS/d' /path/to/cert.
1024-long DH.Nginx:
Run the following command to generate 1024bit DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 %gt; /path/to/dhparams.
To remove 1024bit DH keys disable the directive ssl_dhparam.
